An essay upon projects Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.
[2], 35 [i.e. 31] p.
Printed by R.R. for Tho. Cockerill ..., London : 1697.
"Preface to Dalby Thomas, Esq., one of the commissioners for managing His Majesty's duties on glass, &c." signed: D.F. Attributed to Daniel Defoe. Cf. BM. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
